solutions: Open control panel/internet options,on 1st page,locate language tab,edit.And/or go to Microsoft update catalog,in search type: language packshttp://catalog.update.microsoft.com/v7/site/Home.aspx

windows.symptom: Windows 10 nearby sharing        When attempting to share files between my laptop and desktop always get the message "the computer you are trying to share with did not respond". I am running windows 10, 1903 one both machines.
solutions: Hi, My name is Gary an independent advisor and I would be happy to help you out with your concern,Press and hold the Windows key and the R key. > appwiz.cpl > click OK > select “Turn Windows features on/off” > look for SMB1.0 and expand it > make sure to check/tick all SMB options > OK > wait for the feature to be installedAfter enabling smb1.0 1. Press and hold the Windows key and the R key. 2. At the command prompt, type services.msc and then press Enter. 3. Find each of the services in the list below. On each service, right-click, select Properties, and set Startup type to Automatic, then click Apply and OK. If the services were not started, start them up.a. Computer Browser (Browser) b. Function Discovery Provider Host (FDPHost) c. Function Discovery Resource Publication (FDResPub) d. Network Connections (NetMan) e. UPnP Device Host (UPnPHost) f. Peer Name Resolution Protocol (PNRPSvc) g. Peer Networking Grouping (P2PSvc) h. Peer Networking Identity Manager (P2PIMSvc) Open Control Panel > Go to Network Sharing > Change Advanced network sharing > make sure to Turn on network discovery on private/public/all networksTurn on media streaming as well on Change Advanced network sharing (Make sure to allow all media devices)After successfully applying the changes, check if the same behavior occurs. If it does, I'd recommend updating both devices to the latest 1909 version of windows 101. Open this link https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/software-downlo... 2. Select Download tool, and select Run. You need to be an administrator to run this tool.3. On the License terms page, if you accept the license terms, select Accept. 4. On the What do you want to do? page, select Upgrade this PC now, and then select Next.5. After downloading and installing, the tool will walk you through how to set up Windows 10 on your PC.6. When Windows 10 is ready to install, you'll have an option to keep your personal files and apps, keep personal files, or to keep nothing during the upgrade7. The process would take a while and may consist of multiple reboots. Make sure that there won't be interruption within the process to make sure that everything would sort everything outLet me know how it goes. :)
Hi BobbyDixon,try following here:https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/4091344/windows-10-share-things-with-nearby-devices

windows.symptom: Small computer freezes        I am using a Gaming laptop that I have gotten for Christmas and late into the day occasionally my screen will freeze for about 1-3 seconds then resume and slowly it gets more repetative til I have to restart this error comes up everytimemy graphics card is updated and is a Nvidia GTX 1660SourceWindowsSummaryHardware errorDate‎08/‎01/‎2020 23:24StatusNot reportedDescriptionA problem with your hardware caused Windows to stop working correctly.Problem signatureProblem Event Name: LiveKernelEventCode: 141Parameter 1: ffffda0ef7e7f010Parameter 2: fffff8035ca6b9b4Parameter 3: 0Parameter 4: 21d4OS version: 10_0_18363Service Pack: 0_0Product: 768_1OS Version: 10.0.18363.2.0.0.768.101Locale ID: 2057
solutions: Well, the same info, minus the mention of laptops, applies with the below additions. And I still DO NOT RECOMMEND you do anything without the system maker's support on a new computer with this possibly very serious error.----- This applies mainly to home built systems though can be used for reference on commercial system maker systemsWays to check the PSU : After checking determining the wattage of the power supply you will then need to check the requirements of the motherboard and devices. Usually the video card is one of the major power users.How do I determine how big my power supply is? http://www.computerhope.com/issues/ch000800.htmOther good sources of information are the device makers' sites and their forums. eXtreme Power Supply Calculator http://extreme.outervision.com/psucalculatorlit...Power Supply Calculator https://www.newegg.com/tools/power-supply-calcu...Choosing the right power supply for your computer http://en.kioskea.net/faq/588-choosing-the-righ...How Do I Test the Power Supply in My Computer? http://pcsupport.about.com/od/toolsofthetrade/f...--------- Ways to stress test a system to see if that helps determine fault (again not recommended in this case).PC Stress Test free software for Windows 10 https://www.thewindowsclub.com/pc-stress-test-f...====== Here to help, Rob ------ Standard Disclaimer: Those may be non-Microsoft websites. The pages appear to be providing accurate, safe information. Watch out for ads on the site that may advertise products frequently classified as a PUP (Potentially Unwanted Products). Thoroughly research any product advertised on the site before you decide to download and install it.Please let us know the results and if you need further assistance. Feedback definitely helps us help all.

windows.symptom: delete keboard languages        I have too many keyboard languages. How do I delete some?
solutions: Hi Luz and thanks for reaching out. My name is Joseph. I'm an independent advisor. I'll be happy to help you out today.I found an existing thread that will help you resolve your concern. You can check and see if the instructions provided can help you.https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/for...I hope this helps. Feel free to ask back any questions and let me know how it goes.Thank you!

I followed all suggestions, but..., nothing gave!Tried removing the languages directly from the settings page too.Went into Control Panel, but I don't have a language setting, so I can't remove languages. Thanks anyway

Hi Luz, In this case, we should delete it in Registry. - Press the Windows key type in "Regedit" and press enter. - Navigate to. HKEY_USERS>.DEFAULT>Keyboard Layout>Preload REG_SZ 00003409 is a Filipino English Default keyboard language. REG_SZ 00000409 is an English Default keyboard language. [You can google yours.] - In my case, I leave REG_SZ 00000409 and REG_SZ 00003409 to remain because it is my default keyboard language. Other keyboard languages should be deleted.Additional info: Do not delete REG_SZ (value not set). I hope this helps. Feel free to ask back any questions and let me know how it goes.Thanks!

windows.symptom: Cannot login as administrator account disabled        Wondering if anyone could help me please. I purchased a second hand compute stick STK1AW32SC when I try to boot up it says the administrator account has been disabled and cannot get any further. How can I get logged in? Thanks
solutions: Hi Stacey It would be best to reset Windows 10 on that stick and you sill have a clean Windows 10 environment . ..Remove any Micro SD card, if installed You need to get into the Recovery Environment with either option 1 or 2, then continue with option 31 Press F8 when you see this prompt during boot 2 Start your PC, just as Windows attempts to load (spinning dots), press and hold Power Button for 5 - 10 seconds to perform a Hard Shut DownDo this twice On the third start Windows will boot into the Recovery Environment and from there you can access System Repair, Safe Mode, Command Prompt . . . etc.3 Go to Troubleshoot - Advanced Options - Reset this PC Choose to keep nothing Then start the Reset
Thank you. I did do a total reset last night but had no joy. Will have another go if I get the chance to tonight. Hopefully have some luck lol

windows.symptom: Camera Roll        Hello,I am trying to print multiple photos on one page.  This is not available through pictures and when I tried to look at camera roll the pictures were not there to choose but the ability to print multiple is...How do I get my photos on camera roll from pictures, or how can I print multiple on pictures??
solutions: Hi Tassroll Are these image files stored on your PC and can you view them in the Photos App? If so, open File Explorer, then on the left, click Pictures You should find those Pictures in that folder and be able to select multiple images (Ctrl + Click) then right click and choose Print to bring up the multi-up print dialogIf you cannot find those photos in that folder, there should be a second Pictures library in the left pane, if you are using OneDrive, click that and you may find them there . ..When you mention Camera Roll, are those pictures you took with the web cam on your PC?

Hi,The photos are on my PC on the pictures tile.  I don't think I have a photos app, and I don't think I'm using one drive either!!All my current photographs are going to the pictures tile, and are not on file explorer.Camera roll, on file explorer, used to be where all the photographs taken were kept but it is not updating photos taken from my iPhone.Cheers

windows.symptom: how do i validate my hotmail account when the product key code is not accepted?        Ho do I validate my Hotmail account when the product key code is not accepted?
solutions: Ho do I validate my Hotmail account when the product key code is not accepted?What has a Windows? Product Key got to do with your Hotmail Account?More information is required to assist you correctly.NB: Do NOT post product keys here.

Ho do I validate my Hotmail account when the product key code is not accepted?Is your Hotmail functioning OK ???If it is and you received a E-Mail to validate your account it was a possible Phishing attempt.Do not reply to it.Also : the product key code has nothing to do with it.
Microsoft will send you a Security Code for your Account, not a product key.

Windows Update Troubleshhoter Keep Running But Do Not Show Any Solution        Hi, I had problems with Windows update I ran the troubleshooter and do not show any solutionor fix he problem that my pc  has to install some updates. Solution?Best regards,Jose Luis Martinez Castro
solutions: Hi, My name is Gary an independent advisor and I would be happy to help you out with your concern,What version of windows 10 do you currently have?(Open the start menu and search for winver)__________________ Open cmd by searching "cmd" on the start menu, make sure to run it as administratorExecute this command on the command prompt DISM /Online /Cleanup-Image /RestoreHealth Run these commands on the command prompt to restart windows update services net stop bits net stop cryptsvc net stop wuauserv net stop msiserver Ren C:\Windows\SoftwareDistribution SoftwareDistribution.old Ren C:\Windows\System32\catroot2 Catroot2.old net start bits net start cryptsvc net start wuauserv net start msiserver After successfully executing the commands, I would suggest performing a clean boot to disable third party background services that may be interrupting with the windows update services1. Go to start menu/search msconfig 2. On the system configuration window go to the services tab 3. Tick on hide all microsoft service so that this won't be affected 4. Choose to disable all services 5. Next, go to the startup tab and on the window choose to open task manager 6. Choose to disable each applications from starting up when computer is booting up7. Close task manager and hit apply then ok 8. A prompt to restart the computer will show up, choose to restart This should restart the computer with minimal third party services starting up right after windows boots up. Once the system boots up. After this, try to update again.In the event that it still fails, I would suggest performing an in-place upgrade, this process overrides the system files which would fix corruptions or damages within the system files/packages while updating the system to the latest version of windows 10.To perform an in-place upgrade, 1. Open this link https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/software-downlo... 2. Select Download tool, and select Run. You need to be an administrator to run this tool.3. On the License terms page, if you accept the license terms, select Accept. 4. On the What do you want to do? page, select Upgrade this PC now, and then select Next.5. After downloading and installing, the tool will walk you through how to set up Windows 10 on your PC.6. When Windows 10 is ready to install, you'll have an option to keep your personal files and apps, keep personal files, or to keep nothing during the upgrade7. The process would take a while and may consist of multiple reboots. Make sure that there won't be interruption within the process to make sure that everything would sort everything outLet me know how it goes. :)
Gary,thanks you for your prompt reply.I have Windows Version 1509 ( OS Build 18363.535)DISM tool show when I run Image Version 10.018365.535 and keep blinking. no results.Best regards,Jose Luis
Thank you for that information Jose. Please do proceed with the next step

windows.symptom: Read receipt in Windows 10        Help me to request Read Receipt. What are the steps to add read receipt requested? Thanks.
solutions: Hello Jesus, I'm Sam, an Independent Adviser. Glad to assist and help with your question.If you are using Outlook.com, follow the next steps one by one. 1. Press Windows key+I on the keyboard to open Settings 2. Find Mail, then Read Receipts. If you are using Office 365, follow the instructions: https://support.office.com/en-us/article/Add-an...If you are using Windows Mail App follow the next steps one by one. 1. Press Windows key+I on the keyboard to open Settings 2. Locate Reading Pane and Mark Item as Read options Do let me know if you have any more questions or require further help.
